definitions.definition: Water or other liquid finely suspended in air. ( Compare fog , haze . )
examples: It was difficult to see through the morning mist .

definitions.definition: A layer of fine droplets or particles.
examples: There was an oily mist on the lens.

definitions.definition: Anything that dims, darkens, or hinders vision.

main_definition: ( countable , uncountable ) Water or other liquid finely suspended in air. ( Compare fog , haze . )
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A layer of fine droplets or particles.
( figurative ) Anything that dims, darkens, or hinders vision.
